name: Quattro Pro Spreadsheet
summary: Learn about .QPW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Quattro Pro is used by casual and professional users to create spreadsheets for various purposes, including invoices, personal budgets, sales receipts, and business expenses. The application can save spreadsheets in a variety of formats, including the QPW file type, which is the primary file type associated with the application.

You can choose the format you want to save the spreadsheet in by selecting File â†’ Save As..., then select the "File type" dropdown menu. Some formats besides QPW include Excel .XLSX or .XLS, .CSV, and Lotus 1-2-3 .123 files.

description: A QPW file is a spreadsheet created by Corel Quattro Pro, a spreadsheet program provided as part of the Corel WordPerfect Office suite. It stores data in worksheets, which contain cells arranged in a grid of rows and columns. QPW files may also contain charts, mathematical calculations, scripts, styles, and formatting.

instructions: You can only open QPW files with Corel Quattro Pro in Windows. The application is included with the Corel WordPerfect Office suite, along with the WordPerfect and Presentations programs.
